function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent results between different assays when concentrations are low","Impact":"Misdiagnosis of SARS-CoV-2 infections, leading to potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Cross-validation of assays using untreated wastewater samples and inter-laboratory validation","Technologies":"RT-qPCR, Sanger sequencing, MiSeq Illumina sequencing","People":"Laboratory technicians, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Laboratories, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited information on the effectiveness of virus recovery from wastewater matrices","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of virus spread through wastewater, potential for false-positive results","Mitigation":"Further research on virus concentration methods and validation of recovery techniques","Technologies":"Electronegative membrane, virus concentration methods","People":"Research scientists, environmental health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"High adsorption efficiency of enveloped viruses to electronegative membranes","Impact":"Potential for incomplete virus recovery and underestimation of viral presence in wastewater samples","Mitigation":"Validation and optimization of virus concentration methods for enveloped viruses","Technologies":"Electronegative membrane, virus concentration methods, adsorption studies","People":"Research scientists, environmental health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental agencies"}]}
